name: PromptElo
tagline: Know your prompt quality with chess-style Elo ratings
description: PromptElo analyzes every prompt you submit and displays an Elo rating indicating quality. Get detailed breakdowns of clarity, specificity, context, creativity, and novelty. Compare your prompts against a global database to see how unique your ideas are.
features: Automatic Elo badge on every prompt
Detailed HTML reports with radar charts
